summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to drainage services of Seattle Public Utilities; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.33.030 to adjust drainage rates; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.76.040 to adjust credits to low-income drainage customers; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.76.050 to revise the description of the method of delivering credits to low-income customers.
committee: Water Resources, Solid Waste and Public Health
